document.heading: Annual Audited Financial Reports Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-255, the “Annual Audited Financial Reports Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-257, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 2002, and December 3, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-552 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-255 became effective on March 27, 2003.
